name: Bring Her Back
description:
A game made for Global Game Jam 2016!

"Bring Her Back" - A moody action-adventure game. You awake in a strange forest clearing, your slain companion nearby, with no idea how you came to be there. A dagger with a mysterious pull is your only guide as you quest to complete the ritual that may set things right...

Ray Grice(Me!) - Design, Directing and Development

Cassie Murphy - Game Artwork and Animation

Soren Laulainen - Original Music and Sound

Jorden Lofgren - Concept, Design and Animation

Austin Nokleby - Concept, Design and Animation
